entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 8.
